# GitHub Copilot Instructions for PowerShell Profile Repository

## Repository Overview

This repository contains a customized PowerShell Core profile configuration organized into
modular components. It includes custom functions, aliases, modules, completions, settings,
scripts, and more with the goal of provided an optimal, modern, reproducible, portable, designed
PowerShell development experience.
